{"id":282710128,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 9 months","timestamp":1575133383,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/282710128/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"9.1 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& height) {\n        int sz = height.size();\n        vector<int> trappableLeft(sz);\n        vector<int> trappableRight(sz);\n        for(int i = 1; i < sz; ++i) {\n            trappableLeft[i] = max(trappableLeft[i - 1], height[i - 1]);\n            trappableRight[sz - i - 1] = max(trappableRight[sz - i], height[sz - i]);\n        }\n        int volume = 0;\n        \n        for(int i = 0; i < sz; ++i) {\n            volume += max(0, min(trappableRight[i], trappableLeft[i]) - height[i]);\n        }\n        \n        return volume;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
